author: By SCOTT McFETRIDGE Associated Press
title: Holdout governors: Some states don't need stay-at-home order
description: DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) — Even as most Americans are under orders from their governor to stay at home to slow the spread of the coronavirus, leaders in a handful of states have steadfastly refused to take that action, arguing…
content:
DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) Even as most Americans are under orders from their governor to stay at home to slow the spread of the coronavirus, leaders in a handful of states have steadfastly refused to take that action, arguing it's unneeded and could be harmful.
… [+5280 chars]
